name: Get out of the Tesla | One Week Challenge 01
name_original: Get out of the Tesla | One Week Challenge 01
description:
This game is a challenge made for a game a week from Game Dev Teacher, The theme was "Thunder Strike".

All assets are made by me including animation.

It was a difficult game to make in a single week, but I'm pretty happy with the final product.

How to play ?

You are inside a Tesla with many ennemies aiming at you with elecric beam. To win this game, you have to open the door with the right code and avoid the beam. Four Question Arcade are in the map, if your answer is right, you find one number for the code, so you have to answer all the Question Arcade to have the numbers and open the door with those numbers.

Don't hesitate to tell me if you find a bug :) .
